sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { CalendarIcon, ClockIcon, DocumentTextIcon, UserGroupIcon, ArrowTrendingUpIcon, PlusIcon, BriefcaseIcon, CurrencyDollarIcon, CheckCircleIcon, ChevronRightIcon, BellAlertIcon, EllipsisHorizontalIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext'; const Dashboard = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('all'); // Mock data - would be fetched from API in a real application const stats = [ { name: 'Active Cases', value: '12', icon: BriefcaseIcon, color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { name: 'Clients', value: '24', icon: UserGroupIcon, color: 'bg-green-500' }, { name: 'Billable Hours (Month)', value: '84h', icon: ClockIcon, color: 'bg-purple-500' }, { name: 'Revenue (Month)', value: '$14,800', icon: CurrencyDollarIcon, color: 'bg-amber-500' }, ]; const upcomingEvents = [ { id: 1, title: 'Johnson Case Hearing', time: 'Today, 2:00 PM', location: 'County Court, Room 304', type: 'Court Appearance' }, { id: 2, title: 'Client Meeting: Sarah Williams', time: 'Tomorrow, 10:00 AM', location: 'Office, Conference Room B', type: 'Meeting' }, { id: 3, title: 'Smith Contract Review', time: 'Nov 24, 1:30 PM', location: 'Virtual Meeting', type: 'Internal' } ]; const recentCases = [ { id: 101, title: 'Williams vs. Northern Hospital', client: 'Sarah Williams', status: 'Active', lastUpdated: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 102, title: 'Johnson Divorce Settlement', client: 'Robert Johnson', status: 'Active', lastUpdated: 'Yesterday' }, { id: 103, title: 'Tech Corp Acquisition', client: 'Tech Corp Inc.', status: 'On Hold', lastUpdated: '2 days ago' }, { id: 104, title: 'Smith Property Dispute', client: 'John Smith', status: 'Active', lastUpdated: '3 days ago' }, ]; const tasks = [ { id: 1, title: 'Draft response to motion', dueDate: 'Today', case: 'Williams vs. Northern Hospital', priority: 'High', completed: false }, { id: 2, title: 'Review contract clauses', dueDate: 'Tomorrow', case: 'Tech Corp Acquisition', priority: 'Medium', completed: false }, { id: 3, title: 'Prepare client intake documents', dueDate: 'Nov 25', case: 'New Client Onboarding', priority: 'Low', completed: true }, { id: 4, title: 'File court motion', dueDate: 'Nov 27', case: 'Johnson Divorce Settlement', priority: 'High', completed: false }, ]; const recentActivity = [ { id: 1, action: 'Document uploaded', detail: 'Medical records.pdf', time: '15 minutes ago', user: 'You', case: 'Williams vs. Northern Hospital' }, { id: 2, action: 'Note added', detail: 'Client called to discuss settlement options', time: '1 hour ago', user: 'Jane (Paralegal)', case: 'Johnson Divorce Settlement' }, { id: 3, action: 'Meeting scheduled', detail: 'Contract negotiation with opposing counsel', time: '3 hours ago', user: 'You', case: 'Tech Corp Acquisition' }, { id: 4, action: 'Task completed', detail: 'File discovery documents', time: '1 day ago', user: 'Mark (Associate)', case: 'Smith Property Dispute' }, ]; const quickActions = [ { name: 'New Case', icon: PlusIcon, path: '/cases/new', color: 'bg-blue-500' }, { name: 'New Client', icon: UserGroupIcon, path: '/clients/new', color: 'bg-green-500' }, { name: 'Log Time', icon: ClockIcon, path: '/time-entry', color: 'bg-purple-500' }, { name: 'Calendar', icon: CalendarIcon, path: '/calendar', color: 'bg-amber-500' }, ]; const notifications = [ { id: 1, message: 'Deadline approaching: Response due in Williams case (2 days)', type: 'deadline', time: '12 min ago', read: false }, { id: 2, message: 'New document shared by opposing counsel in Johnson case', type: 'document', time: '1 hour ago', read: false }, { id: 3, message: 'Court date rescheduled for Smith case to Dec 15', type: 'court', time: '3 hours ago', read: true }, ]; // Filter tasks based on active tab const filteredTasks = activeTab === 'all' ? tasks : activeTab === 'completed' ? tasks.filter(task => task.completed) : tasks.filter(task => !task.completed); // Get greeting based on time of day const getGreeting = () => { const hour = new Date().getHours(); if (hour < 12) return 'Good Morning'; if (hour < 18) return 'Good Afternoon'; return 'Good Evening'; }; return (
{/* Welcome Banner */}

{getGreeting()}, {user?.first_name || user?.email || 'Counselor'}

Here's what's happening with your practice today.

{/* Quick Actions */}

{action.name} ))}

))}

{event.location}

{event.type}
))} {upcomingEvents.length === 0 && (

  • No {activeTab === 'all' ? 'tasks' : activeTab === 'completed' ? 'completed tasks' : 'pending tasks'}

    • )}
); }; export default Dashboard;
